snippet: Nearly all of Wisconsin’s Republican state lawmakers signed an agreement not to comment publicly about the drafting of new G.O.P.-friendly electoral maps.
abstract: Nearly all of Wisconsin’s Republican state lawmakers sign an agreement not to comment publicly about redistricting discussions during the drafting of new GOP-friendly electoral maps.
lead_paragraph: Nearly all of Wisconsin’s Republican state lawmakers signed an agreement not to comment publicly about the drafting of new G.O.P.-friendly electoral maps.

headline.main: Wisconsin: G.O.P. Lawmakers Sign Vow of Silence
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Lawmakers Sign Vow of Silence
